events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it does not fit as expected and I would like to request a refund.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning the product.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Emma to handle the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'd be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return, so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket was too large for me, so I want to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund request. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid label we email you shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and for sending the prepaid label. I appreciate your help with this refund.
Your refund request is now processed. Once we receive the returned jacket, your payment will be refunded within 5-7 business days.
We wanted to check in and ensure you received your refund. Please let us know if you have any further questions or concerns.
Since your refund has been completed and there are no further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for reaching out to us.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback on your support experience. Your input is important to us.
